The *SEO* portlet allows users to manage SEO data of web content and web pages, so they can maximize their website position on search engines.

This is an example of the *SEO* portlet used in eXo Content:

!images/Seo-portlet.png|align="center" width="70mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"!

* *Packaging*:  This porlet is packaged in the _seo.war_ file.

* *The portlet class name*: _org.exoplatform.wcm.webui.seo.UISEOToolbarPortlet_
